item.title: Options trader says Tesla is priced for perfection ahead of earnings. How to profit from a pullback
item.description: Tony Zhang reviews a put vertical spread on Tesla.

item.title: Goldman says these stocks could be taken over as M&A surges this year
item.description: This new trading year could bring a boom in mergers and acquisitions, and some stocks may be poised to benefit.

item.title: The crazy ride in quantum computing stocks continues as shares rip higher on Microsoft's 'quantum ready' directive
item.description: Quantum computing stocks rallied Wednesday after Microsoft urged businesses to get "quantum-ready" in 2025.

item.title: Wells Fargo sticks by negative Tesla view, sees shares plunging nearly 70%
item.description: Tesla faces weak fundamentals despite hype over the company's robotaxi, according to a Wells Fargo analyst.

item.title: Two stocks to watch as banks kick off earnings season
item.description: CNBC Pro sifted through Wall Street research for the bank stocks investors want to keep a close eye on going into their earnings.
